name: Francine Garret
descriptions: Francine Garret is one of the two co-owners of the Atomic Wrangler Casino, along with her twin brother, James, living in Freeside in 2281.

Sister of James Garret and co-owner of the Atomic Wrangler Casino, Francine appears to be the business and financial account of the Wrangler, handling its profits and interest. She is rather uptight about her business and will do anything to keep the Wrangler star attraction of Freeside, as she lets James take care of its entertainment and appearance.
Francine stays at the counter of the Atomic Wrangler from 7 AM to midnight, then heads upstairs to sleep until dawn.
Francine Garret (and her brother James) are the Two of Spades in the deck of Vault playing cards included with the Collector's Edition of Fallout: New Vegas.
PC Xbox 360 After the quest Debt Collector, the option to ask about Santiago and how much he owes her will still be there.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {Concerned}I heard about your run on The Tops. Don't even think about trying that crap here.

topics.topic_text: What goods and services do you have to offer?
topics.response_text: We've got liquor, chems, and whores a plenty. Pick your fix and we'll oblige. Our only rule is no sampling the merchandise. Caps paid in advance.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to see what you have on tap.
topics.response_text: Caps up front. We don't do tabs here.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for a little R&R.
topics.response_text: Since you're new, I'll lay out the rules for you. The prostitutes here aren't slaves. They decide who they service.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to help you with your debt collection.
topics.response_text: Great. There are three people who need to be tracked down, a real mixed basket of fruits. Their names are Grecks, Santiago, and Lady Jane.

topics.topic_text: I'd like a room.
topics.response_text: Just a few caps and it's yours.

topics.topic_text: [Give 10 caps] Here you go.
topics.response_text: Up the steps, last room on the left. If you leave the Wrangler, we'll assume you're checking out.

topics.topic_text: Nevermind, I changed my mind.
topics.response_text: Alright. What can I get you, then?

topics.topic_text: Do you have any work you need done around here?
topics.response_text: I have some work I need handled. Back before we instituted the caps up front rule, we used to allow customers tabs.

topics.topic_text: Will I have to shoot anyone? Because I really want to shoot someone.
topics.response_text: I'd prefer you not kill anyone with a debt. It's a bit difficult to collect on a corpse.

topics.topic_text: What kind of caps are we talking here?
topics.response_text: If you bring all of their debts back, we'll give you a cut of each. 25% is more than fair. It would add up to 150 caps if you bring them all in.

topics.topic_text: Eh, sorry.  I've got some other things I need to handle first.
topics.response_text: Fair enough. Anything else you need? I'm a busy woman.

topics.topic_text: You've got yourself a deal.
topics.response_text: Great. There are three people who need to be tracked down, a real mixed basket of fruits. Their names are Grecks, Santiago, and Lady Jane.

topics.topic_text: Hey, I'm doing all of the work here.  50/50 and I'm game.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Alright. 50/50 it is, but you better bring back all of the caps. If we hear you crossed us, the next bounty hunter will be coming for you.

topics.topic_text: I think I have all of the debts collected.
topics.response_text: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. We need you to hunt down another person.

topics.topic_text: This kind of work costs time and money.  50/50 would cover my expenses.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right. 50/50 it is, but you better bring back all of the caps.

topics.topic_text: How am I supposed to get to the Strip?
topics.response_text: See the King. I'm sure he could work something out to get you in. You'll need to prove you're worth his time, but it'll be well worth it.

topics.topic_text: If I see McCaffery on the Strip, I'll be sure to take care of him.
topics.response_text: Good. Just stop on back when he's dead and you'll be rewarded handsomely. Bring his hat as proof of the kill.

topics.topic_text: I have some other business to handle, maybe later.
topics.response_text: Just bring back his hat if you decide to take care of him for us. He stole 2,000 caps.

topics.topic_text: I took care of McCaffery.
topics.response_text: Yes! Where is his hat?!

topics.topic_text: Right here. <Give McCaffery's hat>
topics.response_text: This is great news. No one screws with the Garret Twins and gets away with it. I need to find a place on the wall for this.

topics.topic_text: The Followers are looking to trade for supplies.
topics.response_text: Interesting... Well, you're going to need to speak with my brother James. He handles all of the trading contracts and general operations.

topics.topic_text: Hey, I'm doing all of the work here.  50/50 and I'm game.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Alright. 50/50 it is, but you better bring back all of the caps. If we hear you crossed us, the next bounty hunter will be coming for you.

topics.topic_text: <Lie and give 600 caps> I collected all of the debts.
topics.response_text: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. We need you to hunt down another person.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Goodbye.

topics.topic_text: Grecks?
topics.response_text: Grecks is a bit cracked, but mostly harmless. Just don't mention anything about his lazy eye.

topics.topic_text: Lady Jane?
topics.response_text: Lady Jane fancies herself a high roller, but she's just another dirtbag NCR prospector. I'm not sure where to find her.

topics.topic_text: Santiago?
topics.response_text: Santiago is a suave son of a bitch, but a total pansy when it comes to fisticuffs. He owes 212 caps and should be around Freeside as well.

topics.topic_text: That's all for now.
topics.response_text: Anything else you need?

topics.topic_text: This kind of work costs time and money.  50/50 would cover my expenses.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right. 50/50 it is, but you better bring back all of the caps.
